DOC.brief_summary: This field based, questionnaire study will document observational data on womens perception of menstrual bleeding in a cross-section of women in Sweden. Each subject will complete the questionnaire at one occasion.
DOC.brief_title: A Swedish Questionnaire Study to Investigate the Perception of Menstrual Bleedings
DOC.criteria: All women 4045 years available in the webpanel of SIFO Completion of the webbased questionnaire
